d.title: Sending a plan email adds undefined at the end of the email
d.body:
To reproduce:
1. Go to: https://getinboxzero.com/mail (or /mail locally)
2. Click Compose (or c on the keyboard)
3. Send an email

The email sends like this:

```
Hey,

It was great speaking today.


Alice


undefined
```

It shouldn't have `undefined` at the end.

This is part of the Mail feature which isn't in heavy use. Otherwise it would be a critical bug.

d.title: Bug when scrolling down in mail view
d.body:
Bug:

## To reproduce

1. Go to /mail
2. Open a thread
3. Scroll down

You'll see a blank area at the bottom of the screen

## Screenshot

![CleanShot 2024-02-16 at 17 22 00@2x](https://github.com/elie222/inbox-zero/assets/3090527/7d987c8a-ff3d-46b7-bce2-1aa5c5c8a6b7)

d.title: [BUG][Outlook]: Not analyzing writing style
d.body:
Logs:
[writing-style-analyzer]: No emails provided for writing style analysis.

UPDATE: Ah, possible I hadn't sent emails from this account yet. I need to check this.

d.title: Mail: don't show subject line twice
d.body:
The mail tab shows the subject twice now (but reply zero feature does need the bottom subject line as it doesnt have the top bar)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e160b1e0-8a0f-4949-b0ee-37daba8feefc)

d.title: Bug: emails being formatted differently in Gmail and IZ
Mobile Navigation Does not close after clicking on the link
d.body:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Visit the mobile version of the inbox-zero landing page.
2. Click the three lines/menu icon on the top right.
3. Navigate to any of the mentioned links (Eg, FAQ).
4. Observe

Actual: - After navigating/redirecting the menu should close
Expected- After redirecting./ navigation it should the menu should close.

Although in other places it does show.

d.title: Bug: unsubscribe page showing different emails based on timeframe
d.body:
In Bulk Unsubscriber, if you're in 3 months view and empty the list.
Switching to "Last month" or "Last week", shows new unhandled emails that don't show up in the 3 months filter.

More context:
The user was seeing one email when "last week" was selected, but 0 emails when "last 3 months was selected".

d.title: Bug: Simple mode: When archiving an email it doesn't remove it from the list of emails
d.body: Simple mode hasn't been released yet. @elie222 will handle this.

d.title: Bug: forwarding emails from Mail client doesn't include the body
Bug: if a user has a lot of planned emails this causes an error on the Automation=>Planned tab
d.body: Fix: don't load all emails from Redis. Need to set this up better.
